title: Introducing: Ghost Brother
content:
Sometimes you just come across a band that’s really striking for some unidentifiable reason.

That’s Ghost Brother. for me.

Perusing Soundcloud’s bank of music, I came across the group and was immediately drawn to their music. It’s a mixture of compelling vocals, traditional instrumentals (notably the keyboard and guitar), and raw electronics. “World of Magic” is a perfect example of their usage of all of those elements in order to create a bizarre track that works.

Having just released their first tracks within the past month, I’m excited to see what else this group has in store.

[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/120774214″ params=”color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /]

Edit: A quick Google of the name ‘Govinda Clayton’, taken from Ghost Brother’s Soundcloud, throws up this result: https://music.cbc.ca/#/artists/Ghostbrothers

Seems Ghost Brother might just be the new incarnation of a different band. Definitely a change for the better….
